mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, password, name, email, sido_code) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{sidoCode})
mapper.select: select user_id, password, name, email from user
select u.user_id, u.name, u.email, s.sido_name from user u join sido s on u.sido_code = s.sido_code where user_id = #{userId}
select travel_status_id, user_id, travel_info_id, `like` from travel_status where user_id = #{userId} and `like` = 1
